Hmmm. Now I can't create new projects either - same stack trace.

I believe this is fixed with the change that I just released to HEAD. Should be 
in an i-build soon.
I still see this in HEAD. Are you sure the change is in?

What did you synch? You need to synch all of these plugins:

org.eclipse.jst.common.frameworks

org.eclipse.jst.j2ee

org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.ejb

org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.jca

org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.ui

org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.web

org.eclipse.jst.server.core

org.eclipse.jst.servlet.ui

org.eclipse.wst.common.modulecore

org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core

org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.ui

You really needed to change that much stuff to fix a single exception? :) I give
up - I only pulled half of those and I'll just wait for the I-build version.

:)

Chuck said that he will be tagging this at 4pm today. I guess that's in just a 
few minutes.
